text: 5:2 Ua Me Ini 29:18; Ofa Gami 1:9; Onger Akaba 40:6; Jon 13:34; Rom 14:15; 2 Korin 2:15; Galesia 2:20; Hibru 7:27; 10:10; 1 Jon 3:11; 3:23Ian arazir ia amiba, arazir gumazamizibagh ifongezir arazim gisɨn tugh, mati Krais bar e gifuegha e bagha uabɨ anigha areme. Kamaghɨn an ovevem mati ofan mughuriar aghuir God ifongezim.
